about_the_game:
The Story


This time, the stage of the story return to the original point: the Rocker Town.

After ending her adventurer career, Minnie Pemesia settled in the Rocker Town and runs a coffee shop. One day, she met the last one princess of the Yuuki Duchy named Yuuki Yuriko , who made her final trip before the political marriage. Maybe it's because Minnie's coffee is so delicious, Yuriko is very interested in Minnie...

Features


The game's gameplay is close to AVG. It is based on the plot with a single ending. What's more is a collection system. According to the complete collection of items, the ending will be unlocked after the day. If the player completes all collections, the game will have a hidden plot at the end of the story.

Other


This story is containing Yuri-love.
